# init(nibName:bundle:)

**Initializer**

Creates a new LookAround view controller from the specified nib and bundle.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor init(nibName nibNameOrNil: String?, bundle nibBundleOrNil: Bundle?)
```

## Parameters

- **nibNameOrNil**: The name of the nib file.
- **nibBundleOrNil**: The [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/Bundle] file.

## Creating a LookAround controller

- **init(coder:)**: Creates a new LookAround view controller object from a coder object provided by a storyboard or nib file.
- **init(scene:)**: Creates a new LookAround view controller with the specified scene.
